title: APIBased
extract: The textbook definition goes something like this: “An application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications. ... In other cases, notably SOAP and REST services, an API is simply a specification of remote calls exposed to the API consumers.Jun 19, 2015
extract_html: The textbook definition goes something like this: “An application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications. ... In other cases, notably SOAP and REST services, an API is simply a specification of remote calls exposed to the API consumers.Jun 19, 2015
